page.title: 06RECREATION_GAMES I PLAY_
page.content: One of my favourite games is British Bulldog. You draw two lines about four metres apart on some level ground. Someone stands in the middle who is on.The rest of the children stand behind one of the lines and they have to run to the other side without being tagged. The last one tagged is the winner. Block is another one of my favourite games.All you need is a lamp post for a block.Some people run off and hide. There is one person on who has to count to one hundred.Then he looks for the ones who are hiding.If he sees someone he runs to the block and blocks the person he has seen.If someone who is hiding gets to the block before the person who is on and shouts{"Cut!"}he is not on for the next game.
